exec: pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "No policy exist for given Resource Group");

item.name: 400 Create Policy : Bad Request Item Not Present
400 Create Policy : Bad Request Expiry Time in Past

exec: pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Expiry time must be a future date/time");
pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Access Denied: You do not have ownership rights for this resource.");

item.name: 400 Delete Policy: Bad Request [Policy not active, expired, or withdrawn]

exec: pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Policy could not be deleted, as policy is not ACTIVE");
pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Policy could not be deleted, as policy doesn't belong to the user");
pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Policy could not be deleted, as policy is not found");
pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Request could not be granted or rejected, as it is doesn't belong to the user");
pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Request could not be granted or rejected, as it is not found");

item.name: 409 Put Access Request: Conflict [Policy already created]

exec: pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Request could not be withdrawn, as it is doesn't belong to the user");
pm.expect(body).to.have.property("detail", "Request could not be withdrawn, as it is not found");
